com.isoterik.mgdx.ui

Class ActorAnimation

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.isoterik.mgdx.ui.ActorAnimation

  • public final class ActorAnimation
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides convenient methods for animating Actors.

    • Method Detail

      • instance

        public static ActorAnimation instance()
        Returns a singleton instance. This will assume the dimensions of the current scene if it has a valid main camera
        Returns:
        singleton instance.

      • setup

        public void setup(float screenWidth,
                  float screenHeight)
        Sets the screen dimensions to use for animations.
        Parameters:
        screenWidth - the width in pixels
        screenHeight - the height in pixels

      • grow

        public void grow(com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Actor actor,
                 float duration,
                 com.badlogic.gdx.math.Interpolation easing)
        Scales an actor from 0 to 1 for a given duration.
        Parameters:
        actor - the actor to animate
        duration - the duration in seconds
        easing - an interpolation to use

      • resize

                   float duration,
                   float fraction,
                   com.badlogic.gdx.math.Interpolation easing)
        Resize an actor given a fraction to resize by, for a given duration.
        Parameters:
        actor - the actor to animate
        fraction - a fraction to resize by
        duration - the duration in seconds
        easing - an interpolation to use

                             float duration,
                             com.badlogic.gdx.math.Interpolation easing)
        Shrinks an actor then remove it from the scene once the animation is completed.
        Parameters:
        actor - the actor to animate
        duration - the duration in seconds
        easing - an interpolation to use

      • slideIn

        public void slideIn(com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Actor actor,
                    int direction,
                    float duration,
                    com.badlogic.gdx.math.Interpolation easing)
        Slides in an actor for a given duration
        Parameters:
        actor - the actor to animate
        direction - the direction of animation. Must be one of LEFT, RIGHT, UP, DOWN
        duration - the duration in seconds
        easing - an interpolation to use

      • slideIn

        public void slideIn(com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Actor actor,
                    int direction,
                    float duration)
        Slides in an actor for a given duration. The easing defaults to Interpolation.swing
        Parameters:
        actor - the actor to animate
        direction - the direction of animation. Must be one of LEFT, RIGHT, UP, DOWN
        duration - the duration in seconds

      • slideOutThenRemove

        public void slideOutThenRemove(com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Actor actor,
                               int direction,
                               float duration,
                               com.badlogic.gdx.math.Interpolation easing)
        Slides out an actor for a given duration then remove it from the scene once the animation is done.
        Parameters:
        actor - the actor to animate
        direction - the direction of animation. Must be one of LEFT, RIGHT, UP, DOWN
        duration - the duration in seconds
        easing - an interpolation to use

      • slideOutThenRemove

        public void slideOutThenRemove(com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Actor actor,
                               int direction,
                               float duration)
        Slides out an actor for a given duration then remove it from the scene once the animation is done. The easing defaults to Interpolation.pow5
        Parameters:
        actor - the actor to animate
        direction - the direction of animation. Must be one of LEFT, RIGHT, UP, DOWN
        duration - the duration in seconds

      • slideOut

        public void slideOut(com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Actor actor,
                     int direction,
                     float duration,
                     com.badlogic.gdx.math.Interpolation easing)
        Slides out an actor for a given duration.
        Parameters:
        actor - the actor to animate
        direction - the direction of animation. Must be one of LEFT, RIGHT, UP, DOWN
        duration - the duration in seconds
        easing - an interpolation to use

      • slideOut

        public void slideOut(com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Actor actor,
                     int direction,
                     float duration)
        Slides out an actor for a given duration. The easing defaults to Interpolation.pow5
        Parameters:
        actor - the actor to animate
        direction - the direction of animation. Must be one of LEFT, RIGHT, UP, DOWN
        duration - the duration in seconds
